job.title: Network Engineer // Cisco // DFW
job.description: Motion Recruitment is partnering up with a global leader in Infrastructure Services to help them bring on a Cisco Network Engineer This will be a 3 month contracttohire position in Irving TexasbrbrAs a Cisco Network Engineer your scope of work will involve new virtual ASA configurations within a cloud environment for disaster recovery servicesbrbrstronguSkills amp Experiencebrustrongulli3 years of Network Administration experience routers switches firewallsliliExperience supporting Cisco network infrastructure and devicesliliExpertise with Cisco Routing and Switching  Catalyst series required Nexxus a plusliliExperience with Wireless LAN Controllers WLCs WAPsliliBasic troubleshooting and supporting firewalls Cisco ASA  Firepower Palo Alto CheckpointliliCCNA or CCNPbrliulstronguThe OfferbrustrongulliCompetitive Pay Up to 60hr DOEliliContract Duration 3 month contracttohirebrliulstronguYou Will Receive The Following BeneftsbrustrongulliMedical amp Dental InsuranceliliHealth Savings Account HSAliliPaid Time OffliliPretax Commuter BenefitsbrliulstrongPosted Bystrong Carolyn Regimbalbrbr
